mapper.select: SELECT a.I_HOST, ifnull(e.I_USER,0) AS like_user, a.COUNTRY, a.C_LAT,a.C_LNG, a.ADDR, a.S_LAT, a.S_LNG, a.b_room, a.BED_TYPE, a.BED_QTY, a.BTH_ROOM, a.r_vastion, a.ROOM_TITLE, b.i_user as host_i_user,b.E_MAIL, b.NM, b.PRO_IMG, b.PH, b.r_dt, c.typ, c.live_type, d.requier, d.aircon, d.sampoo, d.hiter, d.in_hiter, d.wifi, d.breakfast, d.hanger, d.iron, d.hiar_dry, d.place_lattop, d.tv, d.baby_bad, d.baby_chairs, d.self_checkin, d.self_bth_room, d.piano, d.door, f.fire_emble, f.carbon_alarm, f.madic_kit, f.fire_exting, f.bad_lock, g.liviroom, g.cooking, g.waching, g.drying, g.paking, g.gym, g.swim_pool, g.jacuzzi, h.EXPA, h.room_info, h.loca_info, h.traf_info, i.child_ok, i.y_ch_ok, i.smoking, i.animal_ok, i.party, j.stairs, j.noise, j.animal, j.in_pking, j.public_space, j.plant, j.cctv, j.weapon, j.denger_dog, k.checkin_t, k.finich_t, k.ieast_day, k.max_day, k.reser_date, k.reser_end_t, l.FEE, l.Sale, l.W_SALE, l.M_SALE, m.cmtCount, m.comtAvg FROM host_user a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.i_user = b.i_user INNER JOIN Build_type c ON a.i_host = c.I_HOST INNER JOIN FACILITE d ON a.i_host = d.I_HOST left JOIN user_like e ON a.I_HOST = e.I_HOST AND e.i_user = #{i_user} INNER JOIN SAFE_PLANT f ON a.I_HOST = f.i_host INNER JOIN GEST_SPACE g ON a.i_host = g.I_HOST INNER JOIN SPACE_INFO h ON a.i_host = h.i_host INNER JOIN room_rule i ON a.i_host = i.i_host INNER JOIN room_dt_rule j ON a.i_host = j.i_host INNER JOIN check_inout k ON a.i_host = k.i_host INNER JOIN room_fee l ON a.i_host = l.I_HOST left JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(i_contents) AS cmtCount, i_host, round(avg(ifnull(evaluate_val,0)),2) AS comtAvg FROM host_review GROUP BY i_host ) m ON a.i_host = m.i_host WHERE a.i_host = #{i_host};
SELECT a.I_CONTENTS,a.i_host, a.I_USER, a.R_DT, a.contents, b.nm, b.PRO_IMG FROM host_review a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.i_user = b.i_user WHERE i_host = #{i_host};
SELECT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM check_inout WHERE i_host = #{i_host} AND DATE(#{chin}) BETWEEN reser_date AND reser_end_t AND DATE(#{chout}) BETWEEN reser_date AND reser_end_t )
